com.basho.riak.client.mapreduce.filter

Interface MapReduceFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetweenFilter, EndsWithFilter, EqualToFilter, FloatToStringFilter, GreaterThanFilter, GreaterThanOrEqualFilter, IntToStringFilter, LessThanFilter, LessThanOrEqualFilter, LogicalAndFilter, LogicalFilterGroup, LogicalNotFilter, LogicalOrFilter, MatchFilter, NotEqualToFilter, SetMemberFilter, SimilarToFilter, StartsWithFilter, StringToFloatFilter, StringToIntFilter, TokenizeFilter, ToLowerFilter, ToUpperFilter, UrlDecodeFilter
    Deprecated. 
    with the addition of a protocol buffers client in 0.14 all the existing REST client code should be in client.http.* this class has therefore been moved. Please use com.basho.riak.client.http.mapreduce.filter.MapReduceFilter instead.

    WARNING: This class will be REMOVED in the next version.


    @Deprecated
public interface MapReduceFilter
    Interface for filter functions used for key filtering
    See Also:
